item.title: All About Annotations in Java
item.description: In this tutorial, we’ll learn basics of Java annotations, Java built-in annotations, How to create and use Custom Annotations in Java.

item.title: Java Math.pow() method Usage
item.description: In this quick article, We’ll see usage of Java Math.pow() method which takes two arguments, a and b, and returns a to the power of b i.e. ab
